How to make it work?

Well, as mentioned before this torrent doesnt include a working crack, but I've already downloaded this:
[link]http://www.filestube.com/a90RpI0Cl4qdK40uhyqyBO/Globetrotter-2-Round-the-World-Challenge-Full.html[link]

This package includes a working crack, however on my computer this package didn't get me any futher than choosing character. But when I took the best from both, the game worked : D


So; download those files in the link, download this torrent. Install this torrent with the setup file, than copy the .exe file from the other package and you have a working globetrotter 2 game :D
